english.segment1: When i made up my mind. And my heart along with that. To live not for myself. But yet for god, somebody said. Do you know what you are getting yourself into
english.segment2: When i finally ironed out. All of my priorities. And asked god to remove the doubt. That makes me so unsure of these. Things i ask myself, i ask myself. Do you know what you are getting yourself into
english.segment3: [Chorus]. I'm getting into you. Because you got to me, in a way words can't describe. I'm getting into you. Because i've got to be. You're essential to survive. I'm going to love you with my life
english.segment4: When he looked at me and said. I kind of view you as a son. And for a second our eyes met. And i met that with a question. Do you know what you are getting yourself into
english.segment6: I've been a liar and i'll never amount to. The kind of person you deserve to worship you. You say you will not dwell on what i did but rather what i do you say. I love you and that's what you are getting yourself into
english.segment8: He said, i love you and that's what you are getting yourself into
